price: ߊ߬ ߟߊߛߋ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߬ߟߋ ߟߋ߫ ߞߵߊߟߎ߫ ߟߊߖߍ߲ߛߍ߲߫ ߘߎ߱ ߞߊ߲߬ ߸ ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߣߊ߬ߕߐ߫ ߟߊߘߍ߬ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߋ ߟߋ߫ ߝߍ߬
arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qul huwa alladhī dhara-akum fī al-arḍi wa-ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
